name: Staff of Size Alteration
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Staves/Staff of Size Alteration

Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, enlarge person, mass enlarge person, mass reduce person, reduce person, shrink item

sections.body:
This staff of dark wood is relatively more stout and sturdy than most magical staves, with a gnarled and twisted knot of wood at the top end. It allows use of the following spells:

  • Enlarge person (1 charge)
  • Reduce person (1 charge)
  • Shrink item (2 charges)
  • Mass enlarge person (3 charges)
  • Mass reduce person (3 charges)
